name: Cell Soft Lock
summary: Using the Cell Soft Lock feature, the operator can soft lock one or several

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_SOFT_LOCK
parameters.type: EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_START_HOUR    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_START_MINUTE    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_START_SECOND    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_START_MILLISEC    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_STOP_HOUR    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_STOP_MINUTE    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_STOP_SECOND    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_STOP_MILLISEC    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_RESULT    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_START_NR_OF_RRC_CONN_UES    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_START_NR_OF_VOLTE_UES    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_START_NR_OF_EMERGENCY_UES    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_END_NR_OF_RRC_CONN_UES    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_END_NR_OF_VOLTE_UES    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_END_NR_OF_EMERGENCY_UES
parameters.description: The event is generated after the operation of cell soft lock, with parameter that                   shows the result of the operation.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_RELEASE
parameters.description: Ericsson Internal UE release cause. Used to give additional information over and                   above the S1 Release Cause (External).

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT
parameters.description: Indicates the target cell RAT. Has the value EVENT_VALUE_SOFT_LOCK after a                   handover execution is performed.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_X2_OUT
parameters.description: Indicates the target cell RAT. Has the value EVENT_VALUE_SOFT_LOCK after a                   handover execution is performed.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_MOBILITY_EVAL
parameters.description: Indicates the trigger for performing a mobility evaluation. Has the value                   EVENT_VALUE_SOFT_LOCK after a mobility evaluation is performed.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT
parameters.description: Indicates the target cell RAT. Has the value EVENT_VALUE_SOFT_LOCK after a                   handover preparation is performed.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_X2_OUT
parameters.description: Indicates the target cell RAT. Has the value EVENT_VALUE_SOFT_LOCK after a                   handover preparation is performed.

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_SOFT_LOCK
events.type: EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_START_HOUR    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_START_MINUTE    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_START_SECOND    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_START_MILLISEC    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_STOP_HOUR    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_STOP_MINUTE    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_STOP_SECOND    EVENT_PARAM_TIMESTAMP_STOP_MILLISEC    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_RESULT    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_START_NR_OF_RRC_CONN_UES    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_START_NR_OF_VOLTE_UES    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_START_NR_OF_EMERGENCY_UES    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_END_NR_OF_RRC_CONN_UES    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_END_NR_OF_VOLTE_UES    EVENT_PARAM_SOFT_LOCK_END_NR_OF_EMERGENCY_UES
events.description: The event is generated after the operation of cell soft lock, with parameter that                   shows the result of the operation.

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_RELEASE
events.description: Ericsson Internal UE release cause. Used to give additional information over and                   above the S1 Release Cause (External).

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_S1_OUT
events.description: Indicates the target cell RAT. Has the value EVENT_VALUE_SOFT_LOCK after a                   handover execution is performed.

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_EXEC_X2_OUT
events.description: Indicates the target cell RAT. Has the value EVENT_VALUE_SOFT_LOCK after a                   handover execution is performed.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_MOBILITY_EVAL
events.description: Indicates the trigger for performing a mobility evaluation. Has the value                   EVENT_VALUE_SOFT_LOCK after a mobility evaluation is performed.

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_S1_OUT
events.description: Indicates the target cell RAT. Has the value EVENT_VALUE_SOFT_LOCK after a                   handover preparation is performed.

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_HO_PREP_X2_OUT
events.description: Indicates the target cell RAT. Has the value EVENT_VALUE_SOFT_LOCK after a                   handover preparation is performed.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011378 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011378 MO instance.
